 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/topbanner/daily-english.png> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-1-min.png> 	

KSA Retail Academy Graduation

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/abc4646aaf05f1907a73f43a313546dc1085804532.gif> 	

On May 5th, we celebrated the graduation of 389 team members from the Retail Academy across Riyadh, Jeddah, and Khobar — representing a new wave of empowered, future-ready retail talents.
The graduation brought together colleagues from across CRVQ, L1 & L2 CAP, the Skincare Squad, and RAEDA, in a moment that recognized not just individual achievement, but the power of learning, growth, and investment in people.
From awards and recognition to interactive moments and local cultural activations, the day was a true celebration of our values — People, Passion, and Excellence.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

The Fashion Lab Seminar

chunks.text:
On May 5th, we celebrated the graduation of 389 team members from the Retail Academy across Riyadh, Jeddah, and Khobar — representing a new wave of empowered, future-ready retail talents.
The graduation brought together colleagues from across CRVQ, L1 & L2 CAP, the Skincare Squad, and RAEDA, in a moment that recognized not just individual achievement, but the power of learning, growth, and investment in people.
From awards and recognition to interactive moments and local cultural activations, the day was a true celebration of our values — People, Passion, and Excellence.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

The Fashion Lab Seminar

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/340d0ad35a2e63b99ba3fb99042690d117376076.gif> 	

We hosted The Fashion Seminar at Lakum Artspace, Riyadh — a flagship event by The Fashion Lab that brought together industry leaders, government representatives, and ecosystem enablers to spotlight the future of Saudi Arabia’s fashion economy.


The event opened with a warm welcome from Michael Chalhoub and Mohammed Al Dabbagh, followed by inspiring keynotes and discussions that explored the scale of opportunity within the Kingdom’s fashion sector. Read More. <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=899&user=10620> 


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Tune into The Podcast: "Stories From Our Stores"

chunks.text:
The event opened with a warm welcome from Michael Chalhoub and Mohammed Al Dabbagh, followed by inspiring keynotes and discussions that explored the scale of opportunity within the Kingdom’s fashion sector. Read More. <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=899&user=10620> 


 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-3-min.png> 	

Tune into The Podcast: "Stories From Our Stores"

Behind every luxury experience, there’s a story worth telling and someone passionate enough to tell it.
In this episode, Omar Javed, Senior Store Manager at Ferragamo, reminds us that in the world of fashion retail, it's not just about products, it's about people, emotions, and relationships.
From building trust with clients, to personalising every moment in-store, to navigating the evolving fashion landscape, Omar shares the energy, passion, and human connection behind the scenes of the luxury experience. Tune in through: 
Spotify <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=900&user=10620>   |  Apple <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=901&user=10620> 
Anghami <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=902&user=10620>   |  YouTube <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=903&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a43b2146d72aa9d381e9cfbf0c3c4a081444759539.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

BEYOND FASHION – FASHION X FAD

chunks.text:
<https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a43b2146d72aa9d381e9cfbf0c3c4a081444759539.gif> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/04-1-min.png> 	

BEYOND FASHION – FASHION X FAD

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/ea2e0d1362ab57d1c4a32702482ffb961790106387.gif> 	

We officially launched our Beyond Fashion programme, a strategic partnership with the FAD Institute of Luxury Fashion and Style this week with an inspiring session led by Grace Khoury. This collaboration offers FAD students valuable real-world exposure through potential internships, live projects, and on-campus masterclasses delivered by our own talents. It’s a great way to inspire the next generation while giving them a glimpse into the world of luxury fashion. It’s also a chance to learn from their fresh perspectives and evolving mindset bringing new energy, ideas, and innovation into our teams.

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=904&user=10620>
